title: Kevin McCallister

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: You may place a trap on another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must first spend a night to create said trap.
- You can only have one trap active at a time.
- If a player visits a trapped house, the trap will be destroyed.
- If the intent of the visit was to kill, then the attacker will permanently have their defense, attack, or both, reduced by one. Which one falls is random.
- You will learn what roles visited your target.
